articles.author: Phil Flynn
articles.title: Climate chaos as Russia, China dodge calls to reduce coal, carbon emissions - Fox Business
articles.description: America's biggest rivals don't appear to want to play the climate change game.
articles.content: As global leaders flew into Scotland on a parade of private jets from around the world for the United Nations climate change conference COP26, billed as the world's last best chance' to save the plan… [+3427 chars]
